turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need you to order me a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that. What location is best?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in Austin, Texas and there's one off of Parmer Lane nearby.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It must be the one at 1700 W Parmer Ln, Austin, TX 78727

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not sure. Can you check their menu to see if they have Blonde Roast available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It says they don't have the Blonde Roast available right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a Pike's Roast then

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whatever the medium size is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's the grande. Do you want any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a splash of 2% milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how about sugar or sweetner?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See if they can do 1 sugar and 1 honey

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That should not be a problem at all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Make sure you get me the cold brew too, I don't want a hot cofee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So one grande cold brew Pike's Roast with a splash of 2% milk, 1 sugar and 1 honey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is right at the 1700 W Parmer Ln, Austin, TX 78727 location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, your order is all set at 1700 W Parmer Ln, Austin, TX 78727. I'm having the receipt email to your mobile via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
